content: bear crochet pattern / teddy amigurumi / crochet toy / stuffed cuddly toy this toy is made was made with lots of hugs in mind use this pattern to crochet your own cuddly teddy toy the finished toy is about 25-27 cm tall from top of the ear to toe if you use the materials specified in this crochet pattern this is a great pattern to give a try if you are new to toy making - it s not difficult to crochet and doesn t take too long but does include a few different techniques so you can learn all the basics of amigurumi making
